tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Swetha is always very empathetic and she keeps meticulous records of patient history. I find it easy to talk to her about my issues with no fear of judgement. She provides detailed diagnosis information and next steps.

She has been my dentist in Hyderabad for more than half a decade now, and I am grateful to my friend who recommended Sunshine Dental!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: An excellent clean clinic. Doctor Swetha is friendly and an expert in her profession. Her explanations of the problem and treatment options were very good and easy to understand and precise.  I would definitely recommend this clinic especially for foreigners.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I went for my wisdom teeth( both upper&lower on left hand side) extraction. The procedure started on time. I was explained clearly by the surgen the process and how i feel during the process. It was done quickly and smoothly. Entire process took 15 minutes. Felt relieved.
